snippet.title: Hegemone Pass - Kickstarter Trailer (Stealth JRPG)
snippet.description:
Help us out with the development of this Stealth JRPG, pledge your support on Kickstarter!

hegemonepass.com/kickstarter

--

- Website: http://hegemonepass.com
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/HegemonePass
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hegemonepass/

The first of it's kind, it's Hegemone Pass, the Stealth JRPG! Infiltrate the Underworld, your Kingdom, as Queen Persephone, who physically lost her title after being attacked by her mother, Demeter. In this RPG, you'll learn to fight your way against high tension 2D levels where enemy encounters are no longer just enemies to beat, but rather, enemies who will call in reinforcements if they detect you. Use the titles of a leader to eliminate their own and survive being hunted, but beware your leader doesn't fall. Will you succeed in saving the Underworld, or see your Kingdom perish?
